lead_paragraph: Boxing great Bernard Hopkins, who defended the middleweight title a record 20 times from 1995 to 2005 and has never been knocked out, intends to "overdo" himself when he ends a career of extraordinary longevity on Saturday.

headline.main: Hopkins Looks to End Stellar Career on a High Note
headline.print_headline: Hopkins Looks to End Stellar Career on a High Note

snippet: Boxing great Bernard Hopkins, who defended the middleweight title a record 20 times from 1995 to 2005 and has never been knocked out, intends to "overdo" himself when he ends a career of extraordinary longevity on Saturday....
